alert.note: Alert for Chester; Henderson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 11:12AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Henderson and northeastern Chester Counties through 1145 AM CDT... At 1112 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Jacks Creek, or near Henderson, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lexington, Henderson, Natchez Trace State Park, Natchez Trace State Forest, Sardis, Reagan, Jacks Creek, Mifflin, Parkers Crossroads, Scotts Hill, Milledgeville, Enville, Rock Hill, Juno, Roby, Cabo, Middle Fork, Timberlake, Hinson Springs and Huron. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
